title: Looking to download citadel and sabon bold italic
content: does anyone know how i can download citadel and sabon bold italic. in deseparate nee
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Citadel: from Font Bureau, [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164137/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font_frames.tpl?fontname=Citadel)   
Sabon Bold Italic: from Linotype, [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164137/http:/www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?familyid=165&id%5B%5D=10386)   
   
-- K.

_Upload the correct amount of money to http://www.myfonts.com and you can download almost anything you want._   
   
Haha, I might be amused easily but this was a really good reply. ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164137im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
easily amused people have more fun!

Upload the correct amount of money to [http://www.myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164137/http:/www.myfonts.com/) and you can download almost anything you want.
